title: Maruti Suzuki expands Manesar plant capacity by 1 lakh units per year
description: Maruti Suzuki India expands Manesar facility, adding 1 lakh units production capacity annually with a new assembly line. The goal is to double capacity to 4 million vehicles yearly, enhancing customer service and offering models like Brezza and Ertiga.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
